title: Malphite Bio Update

embed.description: A massive creature of living stone, Malphite was born from the heart of the great Ixtali construct known as the Monolith. He has studied the elemental balance of Runeterra for thousands of years, using his tremendous strength to maintain order in a frequently chaotic world.

body:
tl;dr the Monolith was a flying fortress superweapon made by Ne'Zuk; an Ixtali mage who was a part of the Ascended Host. The fortress eventually crashed, and Malphite was born of a shard of the wreckage.

For more context, read on!

The bio never said that that's what gave the Monolith life. We know Ne'Zuk gave the Monolith magic; we know the Void destroyed it. We know Malphite reawakened after being the last of the Monolith left, but we don't know how Malphite's life itself came about. If it was Ne'Zuk himself who gave the Monolith life, then this would be a big reveal in the scale of creation power that the Ascended might be capable of: life creation. If it was more of a spiritual belief-kind of awakening of life, then we can assume that Malphite, and by extention, the Monolith's, life can be attributed to similar origins as Janna and the demons. Hell, it's possible that the rock itself was alive before it was made into the Monolith. We don't really know anything about Ixtali Ascended magic.
